title: Slayer task/Greater demons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Greater demons are slayer tasks assigned by Krystilia, Chaeldar, Konar, Nieve/Steve and Duradel.  Greater demons, as befitting their weaker status below Black Demons, possess a somewhat lackluster drop table. Their two most valuable drops are the rune full helm and the hard clue scroll.  There are many different types of Greater Demons residing around Gielinor; however, with the exception of the Wilderness Slayer Cave, all have the same drop table. Greater Demons may be assigned as a Wilderness Slayer task by Krystilia, and can be found in multiple locations around the Wilderness such as the Demonic Ruins, Lava Maze Dungeon, and Wilderness Slayer Cave.

Greater Demons
Requirements
SkillsNone

Duradel130-200
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Greater demons are slayer tasks assigned by Krystilia, Chaeldar, Konar, Nieve/Steve and Duradel. Greater demons, as befitting their weaker status below Black Demons, possess a somewhat lackluster drop table. Their two most valuable drops are the rune full helm and the hard clue scroll. There are many different types of Greater Demons residing around Gielinor; however, with the exception of the Wilderness Slayer Cave, all have the same drop table. Greater Demons may be assigned as a Wilderness Slayer task by Krystilia, and can be found in multiple locations around the Wilderness such as the Demonic Ruins, Lava Maze Dungeon, and Wilderness Slayer Cave.

Greater Demons are a popular task for those who wish to kill K'ril Tsutsaroth or Skotizo. K'ril Tsutsaroth's minion Tstanon Karlak also counts towards a Greater Demon Slayer task.

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
Greater challenge 100 Number of greater demons assigned is increased to 150-200.


Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Greater Demon 92 87
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Chasm of Fire (Slayer task only)
  • Entrana Dungeon
  • Karuulm Slayer Dungeon
  • Lava Maze Dungeon
  • Ogre Enclave
  • Sisterhood Sanctuary
  • Wilderness near Demonic Ruins
  • Standard Greater Demon.
Greater Demon 100 115
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Standard Greater Demon.
Greater Demon 101 120
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Standard Greater Demon.
Greater Demon 104 120
  • Wilderness Slayer Cave
  • Wilderness Greater Demon, can drop a Larran's key and Slayer's enchantment.
Greater Demon 113 130
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Standard Greater Demon with the highest level.
Tstanon Karlak 145 142
  • God Wars Dungeon (Zamorak boss room)
  • One of K'ril Tsutsaroth's bodyguards, possesses a different drop table than other Greater Demons.
Skotizo 321 618.5
  • Catacombs of Kourend
  • Requires 1 Dark Totem per kill attempt.
  • Counts as a Great Demon Slayer Task
K'ril Tsutsaroth 650 350.5
  • God Wars Dungeon (Zamorak boss room)
  • General of the Zamorak Fortress
  • Requires either 40 Zamorakian kills in the Dungeon, or an ecumenical key.



Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Brimhaven Dungeon 7 No Yes Yes
  • Axe needed
  • 875 entry for each time, a one-time fee of 1,000,000 or alternate entry of one-off fee of 5000 trading sticks
Chasm of Fire 16 No Yes Yes
  • Easily accessible through Fairy Ring DJR.
  • Slayer Task only
Catacombs of Kourend 13 Yes No Yes
  • Drops ancient shard and dark totem pieces.
Entrana Dungeon 2 No Yes Yes
  • Due to not being able to take weapons and armour to Entrana, it is not advisable to complete a Slayer Task there.
Lava Maze Dungeon 3 No Yes Yes
  • As the other wilderness areas are multicombat, one may elect to do their slayer task here.
Demonic Ruins 4 Yes Yes Yes
  • Prayer regenerates at Demonic Ruins, however, due to it being deep in the Wilderness and multicombat, it is not recommended to do your task here.
Ogre Enclave 5 No Yes Yes
  • Most of the Greater Demons in this location are behind a cage, requiring either a halberd or other ranged methods.
Isle of Souls Dungeon 7 No Yes Yes
  • Safespot is behind the two rocks on the western side of the inner wall, south of the skeleton and demonic symbols.
Karuulm Slayer Dungeon 9 No Yes Yes
Wilderness Slayer Cave Yes Yes Yes Level 28 wilderness - fast experience if used with Viggora's chainmace.

[[Greater demon]]s are slayer tasks assigned by [[Krystilia]], [[Chaeldar]], [[Konar quo Maten|Konar]], [[Nieve]]/[[Steve]] and [[Duradel]].  Greater demons, as befitting their weaker status below Black Demons, possess a somewhat lackluster drop table. Their two most valuable drops are the [[rune full helm]] and the [[hard clue scroll]].  There are many different types of Greater Demons residing around Gielinor; however, with the exception of the Wilderness Slayer Cave, all have the same drop table. Greater Demons may be assigned as a Wilderness Slayer task by Krystilia, and can be found in multiple locations around the Wilderness such as the Demonic Ruins, Lava Maze Dungeon, and Wilderness Slayer Cave. 

Greater Demons are a popular task for those who wish to kill  [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]] or [[Skotizo]]. K'ril Tsutsaroth's minion [[Tstanon Karlak]] also counts towards a Greater Demon Slayer task.
